StrategyDescription: Breakout strategy that trades when price breaks the previous week's high or low, with trend filter confirmation

TrendFilterPeriod.Name: TrendFilterPeriod
TrendFilterPeriod.Description: Period for the trend filter indicator (SMA or EMA)

TrendFilterType.Name: TrendFilterType
TrendFilterType.Description: Type of moving average to use for trend filtering

StopLossMethodValue.Name: StopLossMethodValue
StopLossMethodValue.Description: Method for calculating stop-loss (Percentage or ATR-based)

StopLossPercentage.Name: StopLossPercentage
StopLossPercentage.Description: Stop-loss percentage when using Percentage method

StopLossATRMultiplier.Name: StopLossATRMultiplier
StopLossATRMultiplier.Description: ATR multiplier for stop-loss when using ATR method

ATRPeriod.Name: ATRPeriod
ATRPeriod.Description: Period for Average True Range (ATR) indicator

TakeProfitPercentage.Name: TakeProfitPercentage
TakeProfitPercentage.Description: Take-profit percentage when using Percentage method

TakeProfitATRMultiplier.Name: TakeProfitATRMultiplier
TakeProfitATRMultiplier.Description: ATR multiplier for take-profit when using ATR method

RiskRewardRatio.Name: RiskRewardRatio
RiskRewardRatio.Description: Risk-to-reward ratio when using RiskReward method for take-profit

FixedPositionSize.Name: FixedPositionSize
FixedPositionSize.Description: Fixed position size when using Fixed sizing method

EquityPercentage.Name: EquityPercentage
EquityPercentage.Description: Percentage of equity to risk per trade (used by PercentOfEquity and ATRBased methods)
